testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I should be able to access the relevant Expense Head data by entering id via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET body with valid authorization information and correct data (id) is sent to the
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/getExpenseHeadById" path parameters................passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the 6 information to send to the api getExpenseHeadById endpoint..passed * The api user sends a GET body and saves the returned response.............passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..passed * The api user verifies that the data in the response body includes "6", "Tea Expense", "", "yes" "no" and "2021-10-25 13:51:37"..passed
